title: Best joke maker ever

input1: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
input2: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
input1_ans:
That's a classic! Here's another one for you: 

Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!
That's a great pun! Would you like to hear another one, or perhaps a knock-knock joke? Let me know your preference!
input2_ans: That's a classic! Here's another one for you: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!

That's a great pun! If you'd like, I can create more jokes in a similar style. Would you prefer a knock-knock joke, a riddle, or another pun? And do you have a specific theme in mind, like animals, food, or technology?
